00058 typedef enum cpioMapFlags_e {
00059     CPIO_MAP_PATH       = (1 << 0),
00060     CPIO_MAP_MODE       = (1 << 1),
00061     CPIO_MAP_UID        = (1 << 2),
00062     CPIO_MAP_GID        = (1 << 3),
00063     CPIO_FOLLOW_SYMLINKS= (1 << 4),
